column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I like the food here. I have been recently for brunch and lunch. I do prefer brunch because the food choices are a bit healthier. For brunch
column4: and turkey sausage. It was all spectacular. I do wish they had coffee drinks
column5: but they do serve Katz Coffee. It is good
column7: which we thought was pretty expensive
column8: especially since I had only one cup. It is a bar scene so it's casual and always noisy. Don't come here expecting a nice place for quiet conversation. Service is ok
column9: but because it is a busy and crowded restaurant
column10: service is spotty. There is valet parking and the parking lot is a bit small and busy. The valets are actually very nice and polite. It has a nice vibe and it is a fun place to go.
